solution_line_template: If a monkey swings {avg_distance_per_second} meters a second then a monkey can swing {avg_distance_per_second} meters/second * {seconds_per_minute} seconds/minute = <<{avg_distance_per_second}*{seconds_per_minute}={distance_per_minute}>>{distance_per_minute} meters in a minute.

If a monkey swings {distance_per_minute} meters in a minute then a monkey can swing {distance_per_minute} meters/min * {total_minutes} minutes = <<{distance_per_minute}*{total_minutes}={total_distance_swung}>>{total_distance_swung} meters in {total_minutes} minutes
